entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17 except minus 7 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 except minus 7 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 13 except minus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
